item.title: Introduction to Java
item.description: What is JAVAJava is a programming language and a computing platform. It is used for: Mobile applications (Android apps) Desktop applications Web applications Web servers and application servers Games Database connection And much, much more! To it’s core, JAVA is a object-oriented programming language. Object Oriented ProgrammingObject-oriented programming (OOP) is a programming paradigm based on the concept of objects. Objects are nothing but the instances of classes. A class is a blueprint for creating objects.
